titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2) to authorize funds for construction of highways, for highway safety programs, and for mass transportation programs, to expand and improve the relocation assistance program, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-3.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2 (surface transportation assistance).
